product_name: Red River Gorge Rock Climbs - South - Volume 2
long_description: . Author: Ray Ellington. Softcover, 296 pages, color photographs. Wolverine Publishing; copyright 2012. Volume 2 of. Among the cliffs included in this guide are Muir Valley, the PMRP, the Motherlode and Chocolate Factory. Climbs are divided into sport climbs, traditional climbs and boulder problems. Features access information, local eateries and services and introductory glosses on each area. Detailed maps orient you to the climb, and illustrated photos direct you up the routes.
short_description: Red River Gorge Rock Climbs provides detailed information on climbing the spectacular sandstone in eastern Kentucky. This volume covers the southern half of the gorge.
